mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo ( userId, userPw, userName, joinDate) VALUES ( #{id}, #{password}, #{userName}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT userId FROM userinfo WHERE userId = #{id}
SELECT userId, userSeq, userName, userState, if(userState > 0 , '활동', '정지') as status FROM userinfo

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT debatecolSeq AS id, debateTitle AS title, (SELECT userId FROM userinfo ui where ui.userSeq = A.userSeq) AS userId, DATE_FORMAT(openDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createDate, 'nonfacedebatecollect' AS table_nm FROM nonfacedebatecollect A UNION ALL SELECT reviewSeq AS id, bookName AS title, (SELECT userId FROM userinfo ui where ui.userSeq = B.userSeq) AS userId, DATE_FORMAT(enrollDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createDate, 'bookreview' AS table_nm FROM bookreview B ) AA ORDER BY AA.createDate DESC

DELETE FROM nonfacedebatecollect WHERE debatecolSeq = #{ board_id }
